texts.name: Galuum
texts.biography: Many say that Galuum was once a slave trader, who, due to an ancient ritual, became a monster, but also a very powerful Warlock. No one, however, can prove these rumors. No matter if this legend is true, Galuum is a very talented leader, who frightens his enemies with not only his appearance, but also his skills.

specialty.description:
{Illithids and Alhoons}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Illithids and Alhoons for each level attained after 5th level. Additionally, Illithids and Alhoons get a permanent +1 Speed bonus.
specialty.name: Illithids
